title: Member Profile Flow - Complete Multi-Step Submission
description: Verify that a user can successfully create a member profile by completing all six steps and payment with validation at each step.

steps.description: Navigate to Member profile creation start page
Complete Step 1 with valid data and proceed
Step 1 validates successfully and moves to Step 2
Complete Step 2 with valid data and proceed
Step 2 validates successfully and moves to Step 3
Complete Step 3 with valid data and proceed
Step 3 validates successfully and moves to Step 4
Complete Step 4 with valid data and proceed
Step 4 validates successfully and moves to Step 5
Complete Step 5 with valid data and proceed
Step 5 validates successfully and moves to Step 6
Complete Step 6 with valid data and proceed
Step 6 validates successfully and moves to Payment step
Submit valid payment details and confirm payment
Payment is processed successfully and profile creation completes

title: Member Profile Flow - Validation Errors Handling
description: Verify that each step in the member profile flow enforces required field validations and shows appropriate error messages on invalid input.

steps.description: Navigate to Member profile creation Step 1
Attempt to proceed with empty mandatory fields
Validation errors are displayed and user cannot proceed
Input invalid data formats (emails, phone numbers, etc.) in Step 1
Relevant validation errors for incorrect formats are displayed
Repeat invalid input and validation checks for Steps 2 through 6
Each step enforces validation rules before allowing progression
Attempt submitting payment with invalid card details
Payment step shows appropriate transaction validation errors

title: Agent Profile Flow - Complete Multi-Step Submission
description: Verify that an agent can complete all seven steps of profile creation including payment successfully with progress tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to Agent profile creation start page
Complete Step 1 with valid input and proceed
Step 1 validation passes and Step 2 loads
Complete Steps 2 through 7 with valid inputs, proceeding sequentially
Each step validates and progresses correctly
Submit payment details on final payment step
Payment is accepted successfully and agent profile creation finalizes
Step Tracker component updates progress visually at each step

title: Agent Profile Flow - Validation and Error Handling
description: Ensure that the agent profile flow validates input fields correctly and shows errors for invalid or missing data in all steps.

steps.description: Start Agent profile creation and leave mandatory fields empty in Step 1
Error messages appear and progression is blocked
Enter invalid input formats and check validation errors in each step
Validations catch improper formats and prevent step progression
Attempt to submit payment with invalid payment information
Payment step shows error and does not process invalid payments

title: Authentication Flow - Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify users can log in successfully using valid credentials, including handling OTP verification if enabled.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
User is authenticated and redirected to Dashboard
If OTP verification is required, enter correct OTP
OTP verification succeeds and user accesses protected area

title: Authentication Flow - Login Failure and Error Messaging
description: Verify the authentication system prevents access with invalid credentials and properly displays error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Login is rejected and an appropriate error message is displayed
Enter invalid or expired OTP during OTP verification
OTP verification fails with an error message

title: Authentication Flow - New User Registration Validation
description: Verify user registration enforces all field validations including password strength and email format before account creation.

steps.description: Navigate to Registration page
Try submitting form with empty required fields
Validation errors are shown preventing submission
Enter invalid email format or weak password
Relevant error messages about email format and password strength are shown
Complete valid form and submit
Registration succeeds and user can log in

title: Dashboard Rendering and Responsiveness
description: Verify that dashboards for users and agents render correctly on desktop and mobile devices maintaining responsive layout and data visibility.

steps.description: Log in as a member user and navigate to Dashboard on desktop screen
Dashboard loads with correct user data and responsive layout fits desktop
Resize browser or simulate mobile device and reload Dashboard
MobileDashboard renders correctly with all critical data visible and usable
Log in as agent and perform above steps
Agent dashboard renders responsively on desktop and mobile with appropriate data

title: Profile Management - View and Edit Profile Functionality
description: Ensure users can view and edit their profile information and that changes persist after submission.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Profile Management section
Current profile information is displayed correctly
Edit profile fields with valid new data
Submit updated profile information
Profile updates persist and are reflected in backend and UI
Reload profile page to confirm persistence
Updated information is still displayed correctly

title: Profile Management - Edit Profile Validation
description: Verify that profile editing enforces validation rules and shows errors for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile editing page
Enter invalid data formats in profile fields (e.g., invalid email)
Validation error messages appear preventing save
Attempt to submit with required fields empty
Appropriate mandatory field error messages are shown

title: Step Tracker Component - Visual Progress Verification
description: Check that the Step Tracker component updates visually to reflect current step accurately on both Member and Agent flows on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Navigate to any multi-step form (Member or Agent)
Step Tracker highlights current step and completed steps visually
Progress through steps sequentially
Step Tracker updates in real time matching the active step
Change viewport to mobile size and verify Step Tracker responsiveness
Step Tracker layout adjusts for mobile and remains clear

title: Payment Processing - Success and Failure Scenarios
description: Ensure that payment steps in both Member and Agent flows handle successful payments and display errors on failure gracefully.

steps.description: Complete profile creation steps and proceed to payment
Submit valid payment details
Payment succeeds, user is notified and profile is created
Repeat payment step with invalid card number or declined transaction
Payment failure is clearly communicated, with retry option

title: Routing - Private Route Enforcement
description: Verify that routes requiring authentication are guarded and users without valid login cannot access protected pages.

steps.description: Attempt to access Dashboard, Profile Management, or multi-step flows without logging in
User is redirected to login page and access is blocked
Log in with valid credentials
Access protected routes successfully
Protected pages load correctly after authentication

title: Navigation Components - Responsive Behavior and Accessibility
description: Ensure that all navigation elements (Top Bar, Sidebar, Navbar, Main Navigation) display and function correctly on desktop and mobile, maintaining accessibility standards.

steps.description: Load application on desktop screen
All navigation components are visible and usable
Resize to mobile screen size or use device emulator
Navigation components adapt to smaller screen with appropriate toggles or collapsing menus
Navigate using keyboard and screen reader tools
Navigation elements are operable and labeled correctly for accessibility

title: MemStepOne - Responsive Design Testing Across Devices
description: Verify that MemStepOne component renders correctly and maintains usability across different device viewports including mobile (320px-767px), tablet (768px-1024px), and desktop (1025px+) screen sizes.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials and navigate to /memstepone/:userId
Set viewport to mobile size (375px width - iPhone SE/iPhone X)
MemStepOne form is visible and all form fields are accessible on mobile viewport
Form layout adapts properly - fields stack vertically, buttons are appropriately sized, text is readable
TopBar and Sidebar components adapt to mobile view (collapsed/hamburger menu if applicable)
StepTracker component displays correctly on mobile viewport
Set viewport to tablet size (768px width - iPad)
MemStepOne form renders correctly on tablet viewport with optimal layout
Form fields maintain proper spacing and alignment on tablet
Navigation components display appropriately for tablet viewport
Set viewport to desktop size (1920px width - Full HD)
MemStepOne form displays correctly on desktop with full layout
All components (TopBar, Sidebar, ProfileSection, form) are visible and properly positioned
Form maintains proper column layout and spacing on desktop
Test form interaction on mobile viewport - try entering data in form fields
Form inputs are easy to tap/interact with on mobile, no elements are cut off or hidden
Scroll through the form on each viewport size
Content scrolls smoothly and all sections are accessible on all viewport sizes
Check for horizontal scrolling - page should not require horizontal scroll on any viewport
No horizontal scrolling is required, all content fits within viewport width on mobile, tablet, and desktop
